title: Leaf-bladed spear

properties.name: description
properties.value: The leaf-bladed spear is a two-handed weapon that is used to kill turoth and kurasks as an alternative to the Magic Dart spell, broad arrows, broad-tipped bolts, leaf-bladed sword, and the leaf-bladed battleaxe. A Slayer level of 55 as well as an Attack level of 50 are required in order to wield the spear. It can be purchased from any Slayer Master for 31,000 coins.

Item ID4158

The leaf-bladed spear is a two-handed weapon that is used to kill turoth and kurasks as an alternative to the Magic Dart spell, broad arrows, broad-tipped bolts, leaf-bladed sword, and the leaf-bladed battleaxe. A Slayer level of 55 as well as an Attack level of 50 are required in order to wield the spear. It can be purchased from any Slayer Master for 31,000 coins.

This weapon cannot be poisoned like other spears. Attempting to add weapon poison to this weapon gives the message in the chat box: "The tip of this weapon is not designed to hold poison".

[[File:Leaf-bladed spear detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''leaf-bladed spear''' is a two-handed weapon that is used to kill [[turoth]] and [[kurask]]s as an alternative to the [[Magic Dart]] spell, [[broad arrow]]s, [[broad-tipped bolts]], [[leaf-bladed sword]], and the [[leaf-bladed battleaxe]]. A [[Slayer]] level of 55 as well as an [[Attack]] level of 50 are required in order to wield the spear. It can be purchased from any [[Slayer Master]] for 31,000 [[coins]].

This weapon cannot be [[poison]]ed like other spears. Attempting to add [[weapon poison]] to this weapon gives the message in the chat box: "The tip of this weapon is not designed to hold poison".
